arts.ttl: “Clearly made a mistake” – Real Sociedad fume at referee decision during Barcelona defeat
arts.sum: On Sunday, Barcelona returned to the top of La Liga with a 2-1 victory over Real Sociedad at the Estadi Olimpic Lluis Companys, but it was not without some controversy. Specifically, there have been claims that the Catalans’ equalising goal, scored by Jules Kounde, should not have been allowed to happen. arts.ttl: Barcelona defender admits the team ‘suffered too much’ in Real Sociedad win
arts.sum: Barcelona may have climbed to the top of La Liga with a 2-1 victory over Real Sociedad, but not everyone was fully satisfied with the performance. Jules Kounde, who scored one of the goals, was open in his criticism after the final whistle, admitting that the team made the game more difficult than it needed […] The post Barcelona defender admits the team ‘suffered too much’ in Real Sociedad win appeared first on Barca Universal.

arts.ttl: Roony Bardghji, Pedro ‘Dro’ Fernandez react after Barcelona 2-1 Real Sociedad – ‘It is a fantastic feeling’
arts.sum: Barcelona’s 2-1 victory over Real Sociedad not only sent them to the top of the La Liga table but also marked the first-team debut of 17-year-old Pedro ‘Dro’ Fernandez. The youngster was handed a surprise start by Hansi Flick, making the night unforgettable for the Galician talent. Speaking after the match, Dro could hardly hide […] The post Roony Bardghji, Pedro ‘Dro’ Fernandez react after Barcelona 2-1 Real Sociedad – ‘It is a fantastic feeling’ appeared first on Barca Universal.

arts.ttl: Flick talks Lamine, Pedri, Dro, De Jong, Olmo, Gerard Martin after Barcelona 2-1 Real Sociedad
arts.sum: Barcelona grabbed a vital 2-1 victory against Real Sociedad, climbing to the top of the La Liga table after Real Madrid’s surprise defeat to Atletico Madrid. It was not an easy game, but Hansi Flick’s side showed grit and determination to get the job done. Speaking after the match, Flick admitted the challenge his side […] The post Flick talks Lamine, Pedri, Dro, De Jong, Olmo, Gerard Martin after Barcelona 2-1 Real Sociedad appeared first on Barca Universal.

arts.ttl: Yamal enters game in the 58th minute with an assist in the 59th as Barcelona beats Real Sociedad
arts.sum: Yamal came off the bench in the second half and set up Robert Lewandowski’s 59th-minute go-ahead goal in Barcelona’s 2-1 win against Real Sociedad in the Spanish league on Sunday. The fifth win in a row for the Catalan club across all competitions moved Barcelona to the top of the Spanish league, one point ahead of Real Madrid, which was crushed 5-2 by Atletico Madrid on Saturday.

arts.sum: FC Barcelona manage to overcome Real Sociedad and take the top spot on the La Liga table. arts.ttl: Barcelona Player Ratings vs. Real Sociedad: Lamine Yamal Returns to Engineer 2–1 Win
arts.sum: Barcelona came from behind to defeat Real Sociedad and are now leaders in La Liga.
